api_key.label: API Key
api_key.comment: The API provided by The Social Digits

language.label: Language
language.comment: The language specification of products etc. that will be present in the daily feed to The Social Digits.

template.label: Template
template.comment: The template that will be used for each item occurence. The input will be rendered as html. Magic values are inserted in curly brackets. e.g. '{name}' - commonly used values are {name} {price} {product_url} {thumbnail_url}.

ga_tracking.label: Google Analytics tracking category
ga_tracking.comment: Event category name for Google Analytics tracking. Leave empty to disable

active.label: Activate
active.comment: Enable/disable the block on the frontend.

display_advanced.label: Display advanced settings
display_advanced.comment: Displays advanced settings to configure for the block.

limit.label: Limit
limit.comment: The number of items that will be loaded from the API. (0 = block default)

filter.label: Filter
filter.comment: Enter a filter query to add to each API call. The filter must be on the form described here. ('' = block default)

frontend_header.label: Frontend settings
frontend_header.comment: Configure how the block will be presented in the shop.

visible.label: Visible
visible.comment: The number of items visible in the carousel at a time. Be careful not to break the layout. (0 = block default)

step.label: Step
step.comment: The number of items to scroll when transitioning. Enter 0 to use the same number as visible. (0 = block default)

navigation_prev.label: Previous-button image
navigation_prev.comment: The url location of the image used for the previous button. ('' = disabled)

navigation_next.label: Next-button image
navigation_next.comment: The url location of the image used for the next button. ('' = disabled)

transition_speed.label: Transition speed
transition_speed.comment: The time (in milliseconds) the animimation scrolls when transitioning. (0 = block default)

template.label: Item template
template.comment: The html template used to render each item. The input will be rendered as html. Magic values are inserted in curly brackets. e.g. '{name}' - commonly used values are {name} {price} {product_url} {thumbnail_url}. ('' = block default)

width.label: Item width
width.comment: The width (in pixels) of each item presented. (0 = block default)

height.label: Item height
height.comment: The height (in pixels) of each item presented. (0 = block default)

margin.label: Item margin
margin.comment: The margin (in pixels) of each item presented. (0 = block default)

auto.label: Automatic transition
auto.comment: Automatically transition items after a given interval.

auto_interval.label: Interval
auto_interval.comment: The interval (in milliseconds) between automatic transitions. (0 = block default)
